mapper.select: select count(*) as count from coupon_member
select count(*) as count from coupon_member where ${keyField} = #{keyword}

select u.coupon_member_seq couponMemberSeq, u.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq, u.use_flag useFlag, u.id id, m.coupon_name couponName, m.dc_option dcOption, m.dc dc, m.option_header optionHeader, m.option_detail optionDetail, m.open_date_start openDateStart, m.open_date_end openDateEnd from coupon_member u, coupon_master m where u.coupon_master_seq = m.coupon_master_seq and id = #{keyword};

select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select cm.coupon_member_seq couponMemberSeq, cm.use_flag useFlag, cm.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq, cm.id id from coupon_member cm where ${keyField} = #{keyword} order by coupon_member_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN ${start} and ${end};

select u.coupon_member_seq couponMemberSeq, u.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq, u.use_flag useFlag, u.id id, m.coupon_name couponName, m.dc_option dcOption, m.dc dc from coupon_member u, coupon_master m where u.coupon_master_seq = m.coupon_master_seq and use_flag = 'N' and id = #{keyword};
update coupon_member set use_flag = 'Y' where coupon_member_seq = ${keyword}
select count(*) from coupon_member where id = #{id} and coupon_master_seq = #{couponMasterSeq}
